attributes.action: Resume cordial relationship with the First Minister Alex Salmond
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it shameful that Tony Blair and Gordon Brown can sit down with the likes of ex paramilitaries in Northern Ireland and Guddafi. When they do not have the common courteousy to even phone Alex Salmond scotlands New First Minister.
I petition both Tony and Gordon to resume a relationship with the first minister in the interests of the 5 million people of Scotland.
